SEARCH

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
Utils
public class Utils extends Object
The Utils class provides a collection of utility methods for processing user input during a conversation. These methods include validating the user's responses to specific questions and normalizing their input to improve accuracy. The class also contains an array of pre-defined questions to ask the user during the conversation.
Since:
03/13/2023
Author:
Matt Magnaye and Pedro Orellana
